Package jcurses.event

Interface Summary
ActionListener The interface has to be implemented to listen on instances of ActionEvent
ItemListener The interface has to be implemented to listen on instances of ItemEvent
ValueChangedListener The interface has to be implemented to listen on instances of ValueChangedEvent
WindowListener The interface has to be impelemented to listen on instances of WindowEvent
 

Class Summary
ActionEvent Instances of this class are generated by widgets if an user makes an action, for example pushes a button or selects a menu item.
ActionListenerManager This class implements a listener manager to manage jcurses.event.ActionEvent instances and listener on these.
Event This is the basic class for all events, that are generated by jcurses widgets.
ItemEvent Instances of this class are generated by widgets, that manage a list of items, an example is list widget.
ItemListenerManager This class implements a listener manager to manage jcurses.event.ItemEvent instances and listener on these.
ListenerManager This class is the basic class for listener manager.
ValueChangedEvent Instances of this class are generated by widgets, that manage a value, an example is the textfield widget.
ValueChangedListenerManager This class implements a listener manager to manage jcurses.event.ValueChangedEvent instances and listener on these.
WindowEvent Instances of this class are generated, if the status of a window is modified. for example, if an window is closed.
WindowListenerManager This class implements a listener manager to manage jcurses.event.ValueChangedEvent instances and listener on these.
